Uses of Class
jgame.JGPoint

  • Packages that use JGPoint 
    Package Description
    jgame
    Contains the platform-independent classes of JGame.
    jgame.impl
    Package containing platform independent implementation details.
    jgame.platform
    Contains the platform-dependent JGame classes.
